parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be directly from a registered candidate's campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Larisa Blanari, identifying her as a PSD candidate for the Chamber of Deputies. This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The post's public nature on Facebook confirms it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post highlights Larisa Blanari's candidacy and promotes her image positively ("Eu nu sunt de vânzare și cred că asta e marele meu avantaj!"). The objective is clearly to influence voters to consider her favorably, thus fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c". The statement about not being "for sale" is a direct appeal to voters' desire for honest politicians.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting and instead focuses on promoting a specific candidate.  It's promotional material, not news reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the quote from Larisa Blanari might be presented as a personal opinion, it's strategically used within a paid advertisement to promote her candidacy. The context makes it electoral propaganda, not a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>607073918491384</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific parliamentary candidate (Larisa Blanari), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and aims to positively influence voters' perception of the candidate to increase votes.  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate these factors.  The content is promotional, not journalistic.  The post's timing is crucial; even if the official campaign period has ended, posting this after the deadline is a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Larisa Blanari</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Informatia ta, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei reclame pe Facebook (ID postare: 607073918491384) care promoveaza candidatul PSD Larisa Blanari la Camera Deputatilor, continand afirmatii cu scop electoral ("Eu nu sunt de vânzare și cred că asta e marele meu avantaj!"),  avand ca efect electoral cresterea popularitatii si a voturilor pentru candidata mentionata, in clar incalcarea prevederilor legale privind incetarea campaniei electorale.  Reclama indeplineste toate criteriile materialului de propaganda electorala, conform art. 36 (7) din Legea nr. 334/2006, fiind adresata publicului larg si avand ca obiectiv influentarea votului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
